<title level="1" right="Action">[Opportune Riposte](/Actions.aspx?ID=2819) <actions string="Reaction" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bravado" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=801" />
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=825" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 161 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Trigger** An enemy within your reach critically fails on a Strike against you.

</column>

---

You take advantage of an opening from your enemy's fumbled attack. You either make a melee Strike against the triggering enemy or attempt to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=2383) it of the weapon it used for the Strike.
name: Opportune Riposte
